channel.title: Meta on Andy's Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Andy's Garden

item.title: How to Write a Handwritten Page
item.description: I lean on two shortcodes to create these pages. The figure code {{< figure src="/IMG_0193.jpg" >}} And if I need links, the hand-link code {{< hand-link href="https://google.com" style=` left: 13.332134292565947%; top: 55.21739130434783%; width: 17.206235011990408%; height: 17.536231884057973%; ` >}} To generate the CSS for the links, upload the image to https://pixspy.com/ right click to make a selection for where the link should go open the dev console and paste the following code var [_, ix, iy] = $('.
